description: This file defines multiple use case classes in the 'org.example.app.domain' package, each responsible for fetching different entities such as contacts, deals, tasks, and notes from their respective repositories. It acts as an abstraction layer for domain logic, providing a clean interface for data retrieval.

classes.name: GetContactsUseCase
classes.description: Provides a flow of all contacts from the contact repository.

classes.name: GetDealsUseCase
classes.description: Provides a flow of all deals from the deal repository.

classes.name: GetTasksUseCase
classes.description: Provides a flow of all tasks from the task repository.

classes.name: GetNotesUseCase
classes.description: Provides notes for a specified parent type and ID from the note repository.

methods.name: invoke
methods.description: Returns a Flow<List<Note>> for notes associated with a parent entity
